All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractLogger
Base implementation of a Logger.
AbstractRecycler<V>
Abstract implementation of Recycler that properly handles RecyclerAware objects
BasicPropertyEnvironment
An implementation of PropertyEnvironment that only uses basic Java functions.
ClassLoaderPropertyEnvironment
An environment implementation that uses a specific classloader to load classes.
CompositePropertyEnvironment
An environment implementation that supports multiple PropertySources.
ContextualEnvironmentPropertySource
PropertySource backed by the current environment variables.
ContextualJavaPropsPropertySource
PropertySource backed by the current system properties.
DefaultPropertyMappingParser
Utility class to parse propertyMapping.json files.
JsonReader
A simple JSON parser mapping tokens to basic Java types.
Log4jProperty
Annotates a class or parameter that stores Log4j API configuration properties.
PropertiesUtilPropertyEnvironment
An adapter of the PropertiesUtil from Log4j API 2.x.
PropertyEnvironment
Represents the main access point to Log4j properties.
PropertyMapping
A specialized map the converts 3.x properties into 2.x properties.
PropertySource
Basic interface to retrieve property values.
Recycler<V>
Contract for recycling strategies.
RecyclerAware<V>
Interface implemented by classes that need to interact with the Recycler that created them.
RecyclerFactory
Contract for Recycler factories.
RecyclerFactoryProvider
Contract for providing RecyclerFactory instances.
RecyclerProperties
A set of common configuration options for recyclers
RecyclingMessageFactory
A message factory backed by a Recycler.
